UpdateSourceArgs: -NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location - Path 'srb2/server'; Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri ((Invoke-RestMethod -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://api.github.com/repos/STJr/SRB2/releases/latest').assets | Where-Object { $_.browser_download_url -match 'SRB2-v.*-Full\.zip$' })[0].browser_download_url -OutFile 'srb2.zip'; if ($?) { Expand-Archive -Path \"srb2.zip\" -DestinationPath \".\" -Force *> $null; if (Test-Path srb2.zip) { Remove-Item srb2.zip -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue *> $null } }"

-c "cd srb2/server && DownloadURL=$(wget -qO- https://api.github.com/repos/STJr/SRB2/releases/latest | grep browser_download_url | cut -d\\\" -f4 | grep SRB2-v.*-Full\.zip$) && wget -qO srb2.zip $DownloadURL && unzip -oq srb2.zip >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -f srb2.zip >/dev/null 2>&1"
